data.text: @rick_pittman @grumblechuk @CBCNL Imagine this scenario; all you, your close family are triple Vaxxed and decide to hang out with gramma without any masks. Gramma likely will contact virus eventually and due to her age, VERY likely will cause her severe illness or even death. How are there so many stupid people?

@DC_709 @Manson_1984 @CBCNL @GovNL As of tomorrow we will be one of 3 provinces still using it.  
Will be quite happy to stop showing my papers in two weeks.

@DC_709 @Manson_1984 @CBCNL @GovNL Don't care about provinces.
End mandates here.
@CBCNL My god , if not being able to dance in bars is your big problem god help ya
@Manson_1984 @CBCNL @GovNL You do understand we are not the only province using it right? 😂😂😂
